entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid presided over the Care of Magical Creatures exam with a very preoccupied air indeed; his heart didn’t seem to be in it at all.

entities.name: care of magical creatures
entities.description: The students hurried back to their common rooms, not to relax, but to start studying for Care of Magical Creatures.

entities.name: potions
entities.description: The students hurried back to their common rooms, not to relax, but to start studying for Potions.

entities.name: astronomy
entities.description: The students hurried back to their common rooms, not to relax, but to start studying for Astronomy.

entities.name: flobberworms
entities.description: Hagrid provided a large tub of fresh flobberworms for the class.

entities.name: beaky
entities.description: Hagrid told Harry, Ron, and Hermione that Beaky’s gettin’ a bit depressed.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Hagrid told them, bending low on the pretense of checking that Harry’s flobberworm was still alive.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Hagrid told them, bending low on the pretense of checking that Harry’s flobberworm was still alive.

relationships.description: Hagrid presided over the Care of Magical Creatures exam with a very preoccupied air indeed; his heart didn’t seem to be in it at all.
Hagrid provided a large tub of fresh flobberworms for the class.
Hagrid told Harry, Ron, and Hermione that Beaky’s gettin’ a bit depressed.
Hagrid told them, bending low on the pretense of checking that Harry’s flobberworm was still alive.
